AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing NewsAnnouncer, a cog that enables getting notified for a news post in a channel.
[p]help NewsAnnouncer to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: NewsAnnouncer
SHORT: Cog for subscribing to news notifications for a channel
DESCRIPTION: Gives users a role to be mentioned for updates, etc.
